item.title: Core Values for Software Developer
item.description: So you are interested in software development and want to become one who do that job. Initially you think that itâ€™s only a matter of coding. creating source code, have them compiled, and then deploy the software for the customer/client. Later on, you realize that developing software is hard. Even harder since so many things beyond technical issues are also involved. Suddenly you realize that what you have learned in school is not enough.
